Detailed Description

This is the scene displayed when left key is pressed in SCENE-USB-CAN : it permits to chose Virtual COM port number.

UsbUartLineIndexVcp 

Definition at line 14 of file usbCan_scene_config_vcp.cpp.

Function Documentation

◆ line_vcp_cb()

static void line_vcp_cb ( VariableItem *  item)
static

callback registered through usb_can_scene_config_on_enter() trigged when a VCP channel is choosen by the user. It will trig usb_can_scene_config_on_event().

This function performs the following actions:

  1. get application holder ( UsbCanApp) by calling variable_item_get_context() and passing item parameter.
  2. get chosen VCP channel through variable_item_get_current_value_index()
  3. set text to display by calling variable_item_set_current_value_text()
  4. set SceneConfigToSet according to VCP channel value chosen by the user.
  5. Trig view_dispatcher_send_custom_event() by sending UsbCanCustomEventConfig to view dispatcher in order to communicate SceneConfigToSet to MODEL.

Definition at line 42 of file usbCan_scene_config_vcp.cpp.

◆ usb_can_scene_config_on_enter()

void usb_can_scene_config_on_enter ( void *  context)

This function is called via usb_can_scene_usb_can_on_event() when left arrow is pressed. It will display Virtual Com Port configuration menu items.

This function perform the following actions:

  1. get configuration used by MODEL via usb_can_get_config().
  2. create the only item for the top level item list : USB VCP channel selection ("USB Channel") by calling variable_item_list_add(). line_vcp_cb callback is registered to perform actions on channel selection (i.e on action on this item).
  3. set value of selected VCP channel ( VariableItem obtained by calling variable_item_list_add) from value got from MODEL previously through variable_item_set_current_value_index() and variable_item_set_current_value_text() (the text to be displayed to represent variable item value).
  4. set pre-selected list item (highlight). It is obviously VCP channel used because it is the only variable item of the previously created variable item list.
  5. request content described above to be displayed via view_dispatcher_switch_to_view()

Definition at line 61 of file usbCan_scene_config_vcp.cpp.
